15¢ - Heat Transfers

For Cotton and Polyester Fabrics - 1 Color

4.7 Rating

Our best value! Now you can decorate the most popular fabric types including 100% polyester, cotton blends or 100% cotton. Our 15¢ transfers are screen printed using plastisol ink. Application is quick and easy! All you need is a Commercial Heat Press, hot peel them in only 7 seconds!

  • 2 color
  • Durable Feel
  • Lights & Darks
  • Easy Appliaction
Order Now

Ships in 1 business day

Highest quality screen printed transfer for a very low price!

Product Features

  • Works on 100% polyester, cotton or most poly blends
  • Athletic feel - highly durable
  • Helps block dye migration or “bleed” on 100% polyester
  • High opacity on dark 100% cotton or 50/50 fabric
  • Easy Application Process

Recommended On

100% Polyester | Cotton / Polyester Blends

Stock Colors

For 1 Color Designs

Single Image Only (No Gangsheets)

Create your 15¢ or 20¢ heat transfer artwork by placing any single image vector on one of the (2) sheet options. Maximum image size shown below. Price is based on any size up to the Maximum image size. Note: Multiple images or “Gang” sheets are not permitted with this special offer.

Art Requirements

It's important to check your artwork before ordering

1. Save your art file in an acceptable format

Please note that all files are reviewed to ensure they meet our internal printing specs for a quality reproduction of your artwork. If using Corel Draw, please save your file as a PDF before submitting.
